title: PBE
body: So I am wanting to get a PBE account so that I can try out the new reworks. I know that you guys aren't accepting any current applications, but when you are how would I know and how can I sign up? Thank You

replies.body: We won't have anymore info on sign-ups until the maintenance is finished.  We should get more details on applications once that is all done, so be sure to bookmark our[ PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) in the meantime.  Hang tight!
